Webmaster’s Corner

Website Metrics with Google Lighthouse

Web Vitals is here! Besides "unique and relevant content", the way you deliver it (user experience) is now playing a significant role in Google Search rankings, meaning that Google will prioritize pages with an excellent page experience. This article discusses Google Lighthouse, a neat tool designed to audit, analyze, and improve web pages' quality.
Read More

Tip of the Month

Be Consistent in Getting Online Reviews

Online reviews play an important role in the decision-making process of choosing an attorney. Your potential clients are likely looking at reviews of your services on various platforms. Be sure they are viewing quality, current reviews of your services by asking current and former clients to submit reviews on Google My Business, the Justia Lawyer Directory, and Google Local Services Ads.

If you are a Justia Amplify client, you can utilize your customized page for requesting reviews to give your clients easy access to all of the sites where you need their feedback.
